Statute.Title: Gender Equity in Indian Registration Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Équité entre les sexes relativement à l’inscription au registre des Indiens, Loi sur l’)

Minister.Text: Introduced by Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development, Federal Interlocutor for Métis and Non-Status Indians and Minister of the Canadian Northern Economic Development Agency

General.Text: General, s. 3.1 (Report to Parliament) and 4 to 9 (related provisions)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2015, c. 3, s. 98 in force on assent 26.02.2015
